item_overview: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
item_detail:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
+45 Movement Speed
+24 Damage
Duration : 8s
PHASE MOVE BOOST MELEE: 24%
PHASE MOVE BOOST RANGED: 20%
PHASE DURATION: 2.5
